column1: '''Kinn-lai''' were one of the only six tribes of the [[Avari]] mentioned.
It is an [[Avarin]] word meaning "the People". It derives from [[Primitive Quendian]] ''[[kwende

: ''Kinn-lai'', an articulation of "Quendi" (the most ancient name of the Elves), is also the name of a tribe of Avari Elves of the jungles of the Mûmakan in the Utter South of Middle-earth.<ref>{{ICE
